subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=bǎi,bó,1nb=colloquial,1nc=standard in Mainland,1nd=variant in Taiwan,2nb=literary,2nc=standard in Mainland and Taiwan
|m_note=Mainland: bó - standard only in foreign names, e.g. {{zh-l|*柏林}}, {{zh-l|柏拉圖|tr=-}}; bǎi - used for other senses
|c=paak3,baak3
|h=pfs=pak
|mn=xm,qz,tw:peh/zz:peeh/xm,zz,tw:pek/qz:piak
|mn_note=peh/peeh - vernacular; pek/piak - literary
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n
}}
